attacks.name: Shatter
attacks.effect: Discard any Stadium card in play.

attacks.name: Derail
attacks.effect: Discard a Special Energy card, if any, attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mix-Up
attacks.effect: Your opponent discards the top card of his or her deck.

attacks.name: Losing Control
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.
